name: Hide Seek Survive
description: Experience true horror as you move from room to room in your friend's new house, looking for the doll that controls the most dangerous game of hide and seek ever played. Once you find the doll you've won but be careful, there's something loose in the house looking for you as well. Retreating into a closet will keep you safe most of the time, but what is out there won't always be stopped by a wooden door. It's up to you really, find the doll or die. Good luck...
